img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a large, menacing enemy. The enemy has glowing red eyes and is wielding a curved weapon, while the character appears to be defending themselves with a sword. The environment is a rocky, cave-like setting with a misty atmosphere. Various game interface elements are visible, including health and ability icons on the bottom left and right corners, and a "Will" counter indicating four units. A red dashed circle highlights a specific area in the background, possibly indicating a point of interest or objective.
